# POS Vendors Directory

## CRS USA (Authorized Dealer)

**Website:** https://www.crs-usa.com
**Phone:** 1-800-333-4949
**Address:** 4851 White Bear Parkway, Saint Paul, MN 55110-3325

---

## Cash Registers (ECR)

| Model | Type | Key Features |
|-------|------|--------------|
| [SAM4s ER-915E](POS_CRS_USA_ER915E.md) | Electronic Cash Register | Ethernet, 22 LPS thermal, dual RS-232C, semi-integrated payment |
| SAM4s SAP-630 | Electronic Cash Register | Compact design, thermal printing |

---

## POS Software

| Product | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| [SAM4POS](POS_CRS_USA_SAM4POS.md) | Polling Software for POS systems |

---

## Products Categories

- **Electronic Cash Registers (ECR)** — Traditional POS terminals
- **Touch Terminals** — Modern touchscreen POS
- **Printers** — Thermal, Impact, Label, Mobile, Kiosk
- **Software** — Polling, O/S Licenses
- **Tablets** — POS tablets
- **Cash Drawers** — drawer solutions
- **Peripherals** — Cables, Scanners, Scales, etc.
